thread.title: Tom Ford brings his menswear collection to New York Fashion Week

title: Tom Ford brings his menswear collection to New York Fashion Week

text:
Tom Ford brings his menswear collection to New York Fashion Week  25 
The designer ended his show with the debut of his new men's underwear line. Rough cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
